jobDescription: We're looking for a data analyst / data scientist to specifically work on growth initiatives for Aspiration. The growth data scientist will be a key member of the Growth team and will be involved with many aspects of the company's growth experiments and initiatives.  Responsibilities Apply your knowledge of quantitative analysis, data mining and data visualization to facilitate understanding of our usersAnalyze conversion and engagement funnels to identify improvement opportunitiesProvide insights for tests to improve core company business metricsCollaborate closely with Product, Growth and Engineering teamsEstablish and build processes to create a data-driven cultureCreate experiments and drive understanding of user behaviors, macro trends and business processesInform and influence decisions on product, marketing and launchesBuild and analyze data dashboards and reportsProvide recommendations on how to improve key metrics  Requirements2+ years experience doing quantitative or data analysis, ideally with a focus on growth (customer acquisition, conversion, monetization, retention)BA/BS in Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering, Statistics or other technical fieldsStrong understanding of statistical analysisPreferred fluency in SQL or other programming languagesLooker or other SQL-based dashboard/reporting tool experienceStartup/tech company experience a plus  Perks:Work for a mission-driven company with a goal of transforming the lives of millions by helping everyone build financial wealth while also doing good for the worldComprehensive medical, vision, dental benefitsWork in sunny Los Angeles
